category.name: wcf.linkList
category.item: You have a new Comment{if $event->getObject()->userID} from {$event->getObject()->username}{/if} get one of your links.
You will receive a notification about new comments on your links.
New Comment{if $event->getObject()->userID} von {$event->getObject()->username}{/if} to one of your links.
You have a new Comment{if $event->getObject()->userID} from {$event->getObject()->username}{/if} get one of your links.

Hello {$user->username},
{$event->getObject()->username} has a new comment posted to one of your links: "{$event->getObject()->getFormattedMessage()}"
This link will take you directly to the new comment: [url]{@$pageURL}{@$event->getObject()->getURL()}[/url]
